obj5523@graye.name: obj5523
obj5523@graye.examine: Huh..somethin kinda funny about that rock.
obj5523@graye.desc[0]: an inconspicuous rock is tucked in a corner here

obj5517@graye.desc[1]: A black candle rests here, unlit but still threatening.
obj5517@graye.name: obj5517
obj5517@graye.desc[0]: A black candle rests here, making sooty smoke.

desk@graye.name: desk
desk@graye.examine: It is a bare desk, no drawers or anything.

cliffd@graye.name: cliffd
cliffd@graye.examine:
It seems that if you put your toe right here, and your left hand
over here, that you just might be able to climb it.

obj5507_2@graye.name: obj5507_2
obj5507_2@graye.examine: It is a fresh green stick.

obj5505@graye.name: obj5505
obj5505@graye.examine:
You open the book and begin to read:

	Many ages ago, the great paladin knight Graye defeated
the Demon lord, and his disciples Irgon and Scrytin, and banished
them to to bowels of the earth from which they came.  Years passed
and Graye's descendants prospered.  The city of Graye has been ruled
for many hundreds of years by wise kings, directly descended from 
Graye himself.

The book goes on to list dozens of names of kings..
obj5505@graye.desc[0]: The chronicles of Graye rest on the desk here

obj5522@graye.name: obj5522
obj5522@graye.examine:
The note reads:

	Thank you kind adventurer!  I heard the sound's of
your battle with Scrytin, and while he was distracted I was
able to cast a powerful spell.  You will find a magical key
on the ground here, disguised as a rock, and you will also
find that I have magically formed an exit back to my study from
here.  The key will unlock some secret floorboards, and what
you find under there will be your reward.  I must stay here
and help my countrymen from their chains.  Thank You for
what you have done.

			 Signed,
				 King Relnar
obj5522@graye.desc[0]: A hastily scrawled note lies here

ivory_graye5557@graye.name: ivory_graye5557
ivory_graye5557@graye.examine: There is an ivory door there.
ivory_graye5557@graye.desc[2]: The ivory door stands here, shut and locked up.
ivory_graye5557@graye.desc[0]: The ivory door is open for you to walk thru it.

secret_graye5544@graye.desc[1]: The door back to the throne room stands closed.
secret_graye5544@graye.name: secret_graye5544
secret_graye5544@graye.desc[2]: Looks like someone locked you out!  The door is locked.
secret_graye5544@graye.desc[0]: The door back to the throne room stands wide open.

obj5516_1@graye.name: obj5516_1
obj5516_1@graye.desc[0]: A whip, encrusted with dried blood, is coiled up here

obj5509@graye.name: obj5509
obj5509@graye.desc[0]: a woodsman's belt lies coiled here

obj5519@graye.name: obj5519
obj5519@graye.examine: It is finely crafted and old.
obj5519@graye.desc[0]: The legendary visor of Graye rests here

obj5501@graye.name: obj5501
obj5501@graye.examine: It is a itty bitty secret key.

door_graye5548@graye.desc[1]: The trapdoor was found here but left closed.
door_graye5548@graye.name: door_graye5548
door_graye5548@graye.examine: It is a trapdoor, cleverly hidden.
door_graye5548@graye.desc[0]: The trapdoor is open, beckoning you to hop in.

floorboards_graye5543@graye.desc[1]: You see floorboards above you, and they look openable.
floorboards_graye5543@graye.name: floorboards_graye5543
floorboards_graye5543@graye.examine: If you had the key, you can open them.
floorboards_graye5543@graye.desc[2]: You see floorboards above you, but they won't budge.
floorboards_graye5543@graye.desc[0]: Light streams down from a room above.

up_graye5553@graye.name: up_graye5553
up_graye5553@graye.examine: I wouldn't try to climb that! What if you fell?!

west_graye5523@graye.name: west_graye5523
west_graye5523@graye.examine: The ledge widens considerably over there.

obj5516@graye.name: obj5516
obj5516@graye.desc[0]: A whip, encrusted with dried blood, is coiled up here

obj5503@graye.name: obj5503
obj5503@graye.examine: Looks like it would open an ebony door.
obj5503@graye.desc[0]: An intricate ebony key is here

obj5515@graye.name: obj5515
obj5515@graye.desc[0]: Armbands of pure mist hover here.

obj5510@graye.name: obj5510
obj5510@graye.examine: I bet you could go anywhere wearing these.
obj5510@graye.desc[0]: A pair of walking boots have been left here

obj5520@graye.name: obj5520
obj5520@graye.examine: It is finely crafted and old.
obj5520@graye.desc[0]: The legendary breastplate of Graye rests here

ledgea@graye.name: ledgea
ledgea@graye.examine: The ledge is very narrow, perhaps two feet at it's widest part.

door_graye5549@graye.desc[1]: The trapdoor was found here but left closed.
door_graye5549@graye.name: door_graye5549
door_graye5549@graye.examine: It is a trapdoor, cleverly hidden.
door_graye5549@graye.desc[0]: The trapdoor is open, beckoning you to hop in.

obj5512_2@graye.name: obj5512_2
obj5512_2@graye.examine: It's a nice thing to wear around your neck.
obj5512_2@graye.desc[0]: A crimson cape lies on the ground here

poster@graye.name: poster
poster@graye.examine:
The poster reads:

Great rewards will be given to anyone who can 
rescue the benevolent King Relnar.

obj5511_1@graye.name: obj5511_1
obj5511_1@graye.examine: It's a nice thing to wear on your head.
obj5511_1@graye.desc[0]: A plumed helmet lies on the ground here

cliffa@graye.name: cliffa
cliffa@graye.examine: The face of the cliff seems impossible to scale.

cliffc@graye.name: cliffc
cliffc@graye.examine: The cliff face seems impossible to scale.

obj5518@graye.name: obj5518
obj5518@graye.desc[0]: The dark shield of Scrytin rests here

obj5513_2@graye.name: obj5513_2
obj5513_2@graye.examine: It is a finely balanced weapon..standard eq for Graye guards.
obj5513_2@graye.desc[0]: A crimson emblazoned longsword is stuck in the ground here

obj5502@graye.name: obj5502
obj5502@graye.examine: It is a tiny key meant to open a trapdoor.
obj5502@graye.desc[0]: A key to a trapdoor has been left here

obj5512@graye.name: obj5512
obj5512@graye.examine: It's a nice thing to wear around your neck.
obj5512@graye.desc[0]: A crimson cape lies on the ground here

obj5506@graye.desc[1]: Relnar's desk is in the corner.
obj5506@graye.name: obj5506
obj5506@graye.examine: It is a fine oak desk with a drawer.
obj5506@graye.desc[0]: Relnar's desk is in the corner with a drawer open.

obj5513@graye.name: obj5513
obj5513@graye.examine: It is a finely balanced weapon..standard eq for Graye guards.
obj5513@graye.desc[0]: A crimson emblazoned longsword is stuck in the ground here

bed@graye.name: bed
bed@graye.examine: It is a tidy, well made bed.

ladderb@graye.name: ladderb
ladderb@graye.examine:
They must have just placed it here, since the demon threat is averted.
Good thing too, climbing all the way down would be impossible.
ladderb@graye.desc[0]:
Someone has mounted a very long rope ladder on the ledge, allowing
passage back down to the cliff bottom.

floorboards_graye5559@graye.desc[1]: The floorboards look like they can be opened now.
floorboards_graye5559@graye.name: floorboards_graye5559
floorboards_graye5559@graye.examine: You see some loose floorboards.  There's a keyhole in them too.
floorboards_graye5559@graye.desc[2]: You step on a section of floor that makes a different sound.
floorboards_graye5559@graye.desc[0]: The floorboards have been opened like a trapdoor.

obj5513_1@graye.name: obj5513_1
obj5513_1@graye.examine: It is a finely balanced weapon..standard eq for Graye guards.
obj5513_1@graye.desc[0]: A crimson emblazoned longsword is stuck in the ground here

secret_graye5546@graye.desc[1]: A secret door was discovered here next to the throne but left closed.
secret_graye5546@graye.name: secret_graye5546
secret_graye5546@graye.examine: You wonder how the demons are kept from getting in by this door.
secret_graye5546@graye.desc[0]: A secret door was left open next to the throne.

obj5504@graye.name: obj5504
obj5504@graye.examine: Looks like it would open an ivory door.
obj5504@graye.desc[0]: An ivory key has been left here

torch@graye.name: torch
torch@graye.examine: They provide light with a soft magical glow.

obj5507_4@graye.name: obj5507_4
obj5507_4@graye.examine: It is a fresh green stick.

obj5512_1@graye.name: obj5512_1
obj5512_1@graye.examine: It's a nice thing to wear around your neck.
obj5512_1@graye.desc[0]: A crimson cape lies on the ground here

obj5507_3@graye.name: obj5507_3
obj5507_3@graye.examine: It is a fresh green stick.

signb@graye.name: signb
signb@graye.examine:
There is a sign posted here, it says:

	  ATTENTION CITIZENS OF GRAYE!

Due to the demons beseiging our city, their
night-time raids, and their recent kidnapping
of King Relnar, we ask all citizens to observe
the 7 pm curfew!  Those out on the streets after
dark run the risk of being mistaken for the enemy 
and killed!

signed,

The Graye Guard

laddera@graye.name: laddera
laddera@graye.examine:
This is the longest rope ladder you've ever seen!  Makes it easier
to climb the side of the cliff.
laddera@graye.desc[0]: A very long rope ladder extends down to here from way high.

thronex@graye.name: thronex
thronex@graye.examine: It's a throne fit for a king...

obj5521@graye.name: obj5521
obj5521@graye.examine:
The last entry reads:

	I fear my magic is not enough..every day the demons
get stronger...my people are living in fear..we cannot go 
on like this.  Noone save myself knows of the secret passage
beneath the throne room, perhaps I should take it and confront
the enemy?   But I cannot leave my people here alone..and the
legasy of Graye must never fall into enemy hands.  What is that!
The sounds of fighting?! In the Castle?!  I must...

The next few sentences are unintelligible..they say something
about a spell being cast on this room to bar the demon's entry
and something about defending his castle.
obj5521@graye.desc[0]: A personal journal, written by the king is here

door_graye5556@graye.name: door_graye5556
door_graye5556@graye.desc[2]: An ebony door stands here, shutting out visitors.
door_graye5556@graye.desc[0]: The ebony door was left open by someone, inviting visitors.

ivory_graye5556@graye.name: ivory_graye5556
ivory_graye5556@graye.examine: There is an ivory door there.

obj5507_1@graye.name: obj5507_1
obj5507_1@graye.examine: It is a fresh green stick.

stone@graye.name: stone
stone@graye.examine: It is a giant stone tablet supporting the coffin of Graye.

cliffb@graye.name: cliffb
cliffb@graye.examine: The face of the cliff seems impossible to scale.

sign@graye.name: sign
sign@graye.examine:
The sign reads:

******************************

*       The Graye Area       *   
*         Written By:        *
*      Aten of GenericMUD    *
*         April 1994         *
*                            *
******************************
* 2/98 Converted & modified  *

******************************

east_graye5523@graye.name: east_graye5523
east_graye5523@graye.examine: The rocks look kinda unstable over there.

obj5511@graye.name: obj5511
obj5511@graye.examine: It's a nice thing to wear on your head.
obj5511@graye.desc[0]: A plumed helmet lies on the ground here

basin@graye.name: basin
basin@graye.examine: It is a very nice washbasin.

obj5507@graye.name: obj5507
obj5507@graye.examine: It is a fresh green stick.

obj5511_2@graye.name: obj5511_2
obj5511_2@graye.examine: It's a nice thing to wear on your head.
obj5511_2@graye.desc[0]: A plumed helmet lies on the ground here

obj5508@graye.name: obj5508
obj5508@graye.desc[0]: a woodsman's cloak is crumpled up here

coffin@graye.name: coffin
coffin@graye.examine:
The coffin holds the remains of Graye.  His gift to you
is not within it.

obj5514@graye.name: obj5514
obj5514@graye.examine: It seems to have been severed off a demons corpse.
obj5514@graye.desc[0]: a severed claw lies on the ground here, making a puddle

graye5545@graye.title: Rymat's Chamber
graye5545@graye.description:
You find yourself in a small undecorated chamber.  There is
a &+Bbed&*, &+Bdesk&*, and finely crafted &+Bwashbasin.

graye5521@graye.title: The Overhang
graye5521@graye.description:
You progress upwards is stopped by what appears to be
an overhang.  It would be a nice place to stop an rest..if you
weren't underneath it.  You glance around for an alternate path..

graye5547@graye.title: The Tunnel
graye5547@graye.description: The tunnel begins to curve upwards.

graye5522@graye.title: Hanging By a Thread
graye5522@graye.description:
As you reach for your next handhold, the rock comes loose 
and tumbles down, down, down to the ground.  You barely manage to
save yourself by clinging desperately to the rock face with your 
other hand.  Returning back west is out of the question, but you
might be able to pull yourself upwards onto a very thin &+Cledge.

graye5507@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5507@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5556@graye.title: Scrytin's Chamber of Doom
graye5556@graye.description:
This chamber is COVERED in blood.  The Arch-Demon Scrytin
has made this foul place his abode.  There is an Ivory door to the 
east.

graye5555@graye.title: Irgon's Guard Room
graye5555@graye.description:
You find yourself in a small guard room.  Chambers to the 
east and west house prisoners, and an ebony door blocks the 
way north.  Instruments of torture line the walls, and blood is
splattered everywhere.

graye5553@graye.title: Inside the Rift
graye5553@graye.description:
There is a ledge here, and a tunnel which leads into the 
earth.  Far below you, lava churns and bubbles.

graye5536@graye.title: The Demon's Wood
graye5536@graye.description:
You find yourself among the twisted, gnarled trunks of
giant thorn trees.  Mist covers the forest floor, and everything
is completely silent.

graye5518@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5518@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5544@graye.title: The Throne Room
graye5544@graye.description:
King Relnar's &+Mthrone&* sits here, empty.  There are rooms to 
the east and west.

graye5552@graye.title: The Rift
graye5552@graye.description:
A great yawning rift breaks the earth's surface here.  
Tendrils of smoke waft their way upwards, stinging your nose 
sharply.  You sense that a great evil is near.  You can try
climbing &+Rdown&*, but you may not get back up.

graye5519@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5519@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5543@graye.title: Relnar's Study
graye5543@graye.description:
As soon as you enter this room, you feel it.  A magical
aura of goodness fills this room, and everything is in a neat 
and tidy condition.

graye5531@graye.title: Entrance to the City of Graye
graye5531@graye.description:
You are standing before the great gate of Graye.  Crimson
plumed soldiers raise the portcullis and urge you the enter quickly.

graye5513@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5513@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5540@graye.title: Inside the Castle
graye5540@graye.description:
Everything here is a mess.  Furniture has been overturned,
paintings slashed, even the gold inlaid tiles have been torn up.

graye5548@graye.title: Tunnel's End
graye5548@graye.description:
You reach the end of the tunnel.  Just above you, sunlight
peeks around the edge of a &+ytrapdoor&*.

graye5529@graye.title: The Clearing
graye5529@graye.description:
You are in a wide clearing between the city walls and
the forest.  You see men atop the walls pointing at you and 
gesturing frantically.

graye5501@graye.title: The Grasslands
graye5501@graye.description:
The grass is particularly tall in this area, save for what
has been matted down by travelers and carriages.  Rabbits duck into
the high grass as you approach and plovers fly low attempting to
catch insects.  A trail runs to the northeast.

graye5504@graye.title: Entrance to the Forest of Graye
graye5504@graye.description:
The trail passes into the shade here, and the temperature
drops quite suddenly.  Great broad leaf trees gather the descending
sunlight, and cover the leaf-strewn forest floor with dappled sunlight.
The wagon trail becomes much wider here, showing signs of recent heavy
use.  The wagon trail runs from west to east here, and it looks possible
to venture into the forest to the north and south.

graye5549@graye.title: The Valley of Demons
graye5549@graye.description:
You emerge from the tunnel, and take a look around you.
To the far south you can just barely see one of the castle's towers
over the trees.  To the north, the land sloped downward, and thick, 
gnarled thorn trees prevent movement to the east or west.

graye5546@graye.title: The Tunnel
graye5546@graye.description:
The tunnel has a bare dirt floor, and its sides are of
rough-hewn rock.  Magical &+Ytorches&* are set in each side of the
tunnel wall, providing light.

graye5527@graye.title: The Clearing
graye5527@graye.description:
You are in a wide clearing between the city walls and
the forest.  You see men atop the walls pointing at you and 
gesturing frantically.

graye5517@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5517@graye.description:
You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.
There is a &+Ccliff&* face to the north.

graye5509@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5509@graye.description:
You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.
There is a sheer &+Ccliff&* face to the west, rising up above the forest.
There is a &+Csign&* nailed neatly on the cliff wall.

graye5557@graye.title: Relnar's Cell
graye5557@graye.description:
You stumble into a tiny cell, lit by a single candle.  A
portal seems to have been opened up for you on the east wall!

graye5511@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5511@graye.description:
You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.
The wagon trail ends abruptly here.

graye5559@graye.title: The secret passage
graye5559@graye.description:
You step into the musty passage and let your eyes grow
accustomed to the light.  Stone walls block every direction 
save north.

graye5542@graye.title: Inside the Castle
graye5542@graye.description:
Everything here is a mess.  Furniture has been overturned,
paintings slashed, even the gold inlaid tiles have been torn up.

graye5505@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5505@graye.description: You in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5537@graye.title: The City Street
graye5537@graye.description:
Simple houses line both sides of the street, and guards are
posted at every junction.  There is a castle to the north, and more
streets to the east and west.  There is a large &+Csign&* posted on a
wall here.

graye5534@graye.title: The Demon's Wood
graye5534@graye.description:
You find yourself among the twisted, gnarled trunks of
giant thorn trees.  Mist covers the forest floor and everything 
is completely silent.

graye5512@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5512@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5523@graye.title: The Thin Ledge
graye5523@graye.description:
You are standing on a very thin ledge, just wide enough
for your feet to stand on it widthwise.  The ledge widens to the
west and east.

graye5524@graye.title: The Ledge
graye5524@graye.description:
You find yourself on a very wide ledge.  You could stretch
out here and take a nap if you wanted too.  To the south you get a
fantastic view of the entire forest.  There is perhaps another 
forty feet to the top of the cliff, all of which appears to be an
easy climb.

graye5535@graye.title: The Demon's Wood
graye5535@graye.description:
You find yourself among the twisted, gnarled trunks of
giant thorn trees.  Mist covers the forest floor, and everything 
is completely silent.

graye5526@graye.title: Top of the Cliff
graye5526@graye.description:
You reach the top of the cliff and struggle to your feet.
You spend several moments just turning around, taking in all that 
you see.  To the south and east you see the forest sweeping outwards
from the cliff wall, and to the north you see a clearing surrounding
a small town.

graye5508@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5508@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5550@graye.title: The Valley of Demons
graye5550@graye.description:
You are heading deeper and deeper into a valley.  The walls 
climb up on either side of you, soon becoming nearly vertical.  Your
path is slowed by thick choking vegetation grabbing your boots.
The path back to the south disappears in darkness, and your path 
continues to dip as you head to the north.

graye5532@graye.title: The Clearing
graye5532@graye.description:
You are in a wide clearing between the city walls and
the forest.  You see men atop the walls pointing at you and 
gesturing frantically.

graye5533@graye.title: The Demon's Wood
graye5533@graye.description:
You find yourself among the twisted, gnarled trunks of
giant thorn trees.  Mist covers the forest floor and everything
is completely silent.

graye5502@graye.title: The Great Field
graye5502@graye.description:
You are standing in a great field of tall grass.  The 
smell of fresh dirt and sunlight surrounds you.  The air is 
filled with the sound of chirping birds happily building their
nests in the depths of the knotted grass.  A wagon trail runs
in an east-south direction.

graye5538@graye.title: The City Streets
graye5538@graye.description:
Small houses line both sides of the street, and
armed guards are posted at every junction.  You see a 
small &+Yposter&* pasted to the wall here.

graye5541@graye.title: Entrance to Relnar's Castle
graye5541@graye.description:
You stand before the ajar gate of the castle.  You here
complete silence from inside.  City life continues to bustle around
you.

graye5506@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5506@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5528@graye.title: The Clearing
graye5528@graye.description:
You are in a wide clearing between the city walls and
the forest.  You see men atop the walls pointing at you and 
gesturing frantically.

graye5520@graye.title: The Cliff Wall
graye5520@graye.description:
You inch your way upwards, hand over hand, searching out 
more footholds.  Sweat stings your eyes, and your breathing becomes
ragged.  You can still drop safely to the forest floor, or madly
continue upwards.

graye5561@graye.title: The Tomb of Graye
graye5561@graye.description:
You enter a huge circular room.  A guilded gold &+Ycoffin
rests in the center atop at &+Cstone&* tablet.  Treasure is piled
high against all the walls.  You have found the final resting
place of the paladin knight Graye.

graye5514@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5514@graye.description:
You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.
There is a sheer &+Ccliff&* face to the north, rising above the forest.

graye5551@graye.title: The Valley Floor
graye5551@graye.description:
You have reached the very bottom of the valley.  The hills 
climb steeply to the east and west.  A sudden gust of wind brings 
you the smell of sulphur from the north.

graye5516@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5516@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

graye5525@graye.title: Oops.
graye5525@graye.description:
"Aaarrrggg!", you scream as you plummet toward the earth.
The ground rushes up at you at a dizzying pace, and you prepare
for impact.  Suddenly, there is a flash of blinding light, and
you feel yourself floating in white light.  You notice a glint
in Aten's eye.  

"Your time was not to come yet..", he utters in disappointment.
He waves his hands and you find yourself before the portal in
which you entered this world, of which you will have to reenter
to resume your quest....

graye5503@graye.title: The Forest's Edge
graye5503@graye.description:
The grassland fades to spotted scrub here, and finally 
merges into a great line of trees.  To the far north a stormcloud
hangs in the air ominously, but strangely enough it is still quite
pleasant out.  Crickets chirp merrily, and the sun's rays warm your
skin.  The wagon trail leads eastwards back into the grassland, 
and dissapears westwards into the forest.

graye5554@graye.title: The Tunnel
graye5554@graye.description:
The tunnel leads north and south, and to either side 
of you are great cells.  Peeking in a smudged window, you 
see human prisoners, many of them wearing the uniform of the
Graye Guard.

graye5560@graye.title: The Catacombs
graye5560@graye.description:
You walk along the passage, and notice the remains of 
all the previous kings of Graye are buried on either side of you.
You can see in the room, but there is no discernable source of 
light.  The passage continues on to the north and south.

graye5539@graye.title: The City Streets
graye5539@graye.description:
Small houses line both sides of the street, and 
armed guards are posted at every junction.

graye5510@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5510@graye.description:
You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.
There is a sheer &+Ccliff&* face to the west, rising above the forest.

graye5530@graye.title: The Clearing
graye5530@graye.description:
You are in a wide clearing between the city walls and
the forest.  You see men atop the walls pointing at you and 
gesturing frantically.

graye5515@graye.title: The Forest of Graye
graye5515@graye.description: You are in a hardwood forest, walking through noisy leaves.

mob5513@graye.name: mob5513
mob5513@graye.examine:
The guard seems to be..well...mostly human.  He is covered
in boils and tufts of hair.  He glares at you with his one
good eye and says, 'Put down that weapon..prisoner!'
mob5513@graye.description: A jail guard patrols here, whipping the prisoners.

mob5501_4@graye.name: mob5501_4
mob5501_4@graye.examine:
The forest brownie winks at you and scurries away.
Quite an amicable fellow.
mob5501_4@graye.description: A forest brownie scampers about here.

mob5506_3@graye.name: mob5506_3
mob5506_3@graye.examine:
The guardsman smiles at you kindly.  He says, 'better stick
with me guy-- its a dangerous world out there.'
mob5506_3@graye.description: The Graye guardsman is posted here.

mob5503_2@graye.name: mob5503_2
mob5503_2@graye.examine:
The rabbit looks up at you with big brown eyes,
then scoots away..hey..there goes lunch!
mob5503_2@graye.description: A brown rabbit hops along merrily.

mob5503_1@graye.name: mob5503_1
mob5503_1@graye.examine:
The rabbit looks up at you with big brown eyes,
then scoots away..hey..there goes lunch!
mob5503_1@graye.description: A brown rabbit hops along merrily.

mob5513_1@graye.name: mob5513_1
mob5513_1@graye.examine:
The guard seems to be..well...mostly human.  He is covered
in boils and tufts of hair.  He glares at you with his one
good eye and says, 'Put down that weapon..prisoner!'
mob5513_1@graye.description: A jail guard patrols here, whipping the prisoners.

mob5509@graye.name: mob5509
mob5509@graye.examine:
The citizen looks rather nervous- You would too if your town was
beseiged by demons.
mob5509@graye.description: A citizen of Graye rushes by here, looking over his shoulder.

mob5502@graye.name: mob5502
mob5502@graye.examine:
The wolf looks rather hungry.  You see him trying to decide
if YOU taste like rabbit.
mob5502@graye.description: A wolf trots by, looking for a rabbit.

mob5515@graye.name: mob5515
mob5515@graye.examine:
Irgon frowns down upon you.  His oily black skin reflects
the torchlight.  A thick white claw points at you, and
he utters, 'prepare to die.'
mob5515@graye.description: The Arch-Demon Irgon emerges from the shadows.

mob5502_2@graye.name: mob5502_2
mob5502_2@graye.examine:
The wolf looks rather hungry.  You see him trying to decide
if YOU taste like rabbit.
mob5502_2@graye.description: a wolf trots by, looking for a rabbit.

mob5510_1@graye.name: mob5510_1
mob5510_1@graye.examine:
The citizen looks rather nervous- You would too if your town was
beseiged by demons.
mob5510_1@graye.description: A citizen of Graye rushes by here, looking over her shoulder.

mob5514@graye.name: mob5514
mob5514@graye.examine:
He looks at you and begs, 'please! they have taken him! I
can see that you are a great adventurer..please bring him
back to us!'  The advisor turns from you and continues to
sob uncontrollably.
mob5514@graye.description: The King's Advisor is here, weeping.

mob5517@graye.name: mob5517
mob5517@graye.examine:
You look into the eyes of the descendant of Graye, and
know now why his city is so prosperous and happy.
mob5517@graye.description: The good king Relnar is here.

mob5508_1@graye.name: mob5508_1
mob5508_1@graye.examine:
The demon resembles little, but a sinewy mass of flesh,
tendons, and teeth.  It glares at you with pure fury in
it's eyes.
mob5508_1@graye.description: A minor demon jumps out of the shadows at you!

mob5514b@graye.name: mob5514b
mob5514b@graye.examine:
Rymat was totally distraught while the king was imprisoned.
Now he's conferring with him on how to resist the next attack.
mob5514b@graye.description: The King's Advisor is here, relieved his king has returned safely.

mob5505_2@graye.name: mob5505_2
mob5505_2@graye.examine:
You see a nightmarish array of teeth and claws, the 
guardian demon is determined to rip your guts out.
mob5505_2@graye.description: A shadowy form steps out of the mist.

mob5516@graye.name: mob5516
mob5516@graye.examine:
Scrytin looks at you kindly, and suddenly you feel very 
peaceful and relaxed.  You stare directly into his eyes,
and feel yourself slipping deeper and deeper...NOOO!!
Scrytin growls, 'Won't become a minion of mine eh?..then
you shall DIE!'
mob5516@graye.description: Scrytin, the demon lord's apprentice, smiles at you.

mob5502_1@graye.name: mob5502_1
mob5502_1@graye.examine:
The wolf looks rather hungry.  You see him trying to decide
if YOU taste like rabbit.
mob5502_1@graye.description: a wolf trots by, looking for a rabbit.

Quite an amicable fellow.
mob5501_3@graye.description: A forest brownie scampers about here.

mob5512@graye.name: mob5512
mob5512@graye.examine:
All you see is a fog-like apparition, with two glowing
red eyes...
mob5512@graye.description: A shadow wraith drifts into your way.

mob5501_2@graye.examine:

mob5507@graye.examine:
It seems like a relatively harmless little demon, but 
those sharp teeth might hurt if they were wrapped around
your arm.
mob5507@graye.description: A tiny demon snarls at you.

mob5504@graye.name: mob5504
mob5504@graye.examine:
The woodsman chuckles and says, 'Howdy stranger- the name is 
Tomal..howya doing?'
mob5504@graye.description: A woodsman watches you, a stalk of grass hanging from his mouth.

mob5511@graye.name: mob5511
mob5511@graye.examine:
You look deep into the eyes of the beast.  You sense no absolutely 
no intellect, only raw power and rage.
mob5511@graye.description: A major demon lurks about here.
